Read: 

- [Framed! Reproducing and Revisiting 150-Year-Old Charts](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/10618600.2018.1562937)

- [A Study in Reproducibility: The Congruent Matching Cells Algorithm and cmcR Package](https://journal.r-project.org/articles/RJ-2023-014/)


Annotate with hypothes.is

Think about/comment on: 

- What attempts at reproducibility worked and didn't work in each article?

- How important is long-term reproducibility?

- How do the two articles differ with respect to types of reproducibility?

- What important factors must exist for reproducibility?
